name: Devil Magic
summary: Drawing on the infernal power of your sinister forbears, you mislead your foes with magical deception.
description:
Drawing on the infernal power of your sinister forbears, you mislead your foes with magical deception. You can cast invisibility and misdirection each once per day as 2nd-level divine innate spells.Traits

Tiefling: A creature with this trait has the tiefling versatile heritage. Tieflings are planar scions descended from fiends. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by tieflings.
